comment.body:
Okay I can see the input box, but where should I click to publish the comment?

Ctrl+Enter did the work, haha))

I was thinking of the darknet mode for ZeroNet some time ago.
ZeroNet peers look like an ordinary web sites and switch to ZeroNet protocol only when receiving a secret passcode. Then they autenticate each other by cryptografic keys and allow exchanging zite updates.
